description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the remote code execution vulnerability in the Windows Mobile Broadband Driver associated with CVE-2024-30001, you should apply the relevant updates provided by Microsoft:

1. Identify your system version using the build numbers listed below.
2. Depending on your version, download and install the appropriate KB Article:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based Systems, apply: [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems, apply: [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems, apply: [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based Systems, apply: [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 for x64-based Systems, apply: [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 for 32-bit Systems, apply: [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 for 32-bit Systems, apply: [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)

**Details**:
- This is an important update that resolves an integer overflow vulnerability. Applying it is critical to maintaining the security of your system.
- Make sure to restart your device after installation to apply the changes effectively.
- Always ensure your data is backed up before making system changes.

**Build Numbers**:
- Windows 11 Version 23H2: 10.0.22631.3593
- Windows 11 Version 22H2: 10.0.22621.3593
- Windows 11 Version 21H2: 10.0.22000.2960
- Windows 10 Version 22H2: 10.0.19045.4412
- Windows 10 Version 21H2: 10.0.19044.4412

**Preconditions**:
- Verify that you are using an affected version before attempting installation.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
